Reviews.Title: “A quiet oasis in the midst of chaos”
Reviews.Author: DiniToronto
Reviews.Content: fortunate received recommendation stay ayasofya online pictures justice little piece heaven located centre busy hectic city coming home day looked forward yes bit dated refreshment adds charm clean breakfast lovely location fantastic walking distance popular historical sites

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Location, OK Hotel”
Reviews.Author: WorldTraveller1983
Reviews.Content: location hotel absolutely fantastic views onto aya sofya minutes walk topkapi palace meaning morning avoid crowds busy hotel centre city lovely peaceful basic terms facilities bathroom tiny beds comfortable decoration outdated charming depending taste breakfast served garden cafe provided usual turkish breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Great location, quiet, charm... with some drawbacks”
Reviews.Author: flyingFrenchman29
Reviews.Content: unbeatable location ayasofya topkapi quiet pedestrian street hotel split 9 traditional ottoman houses lots charm bathrooms clean decoration somewhat outdated bathrooms basic beds comfortable service adequate reception staff bit cold service breakfast takes nice garden house bit house 9 breakfast food disappointing standard expected juices fresh honey jam plastic boxes tea lipton tea etc wifi equally throughout hotel house connection tv miss overall found expensive charming hotel

Reviews.Title: “GREAT LOCATION - AVERAGE QUALITY”
Reviews.Author: CultureTravellerOslo
Reviews.Content: partner spent eight nights ayasofya location perfect pension attractive ottoman atmosphere surroundings surprisingly quiet considering heart istanbul people considering staying ayasofya aware indeed pension five star hotel stayed decoratively furnished clean beds rock hard tv radio breakfast decent day noticed omlet boiled eggs run waiters filling reserves waiters breakfast particularly friendly welcoming nor staff reception indifferent spent time eight nights establishment dissatisfied experience value money elsewhere istanbul
